total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the numbers 1, 6, 7, and 3 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the range of the 5s in the input grid.
Q3: Divide the range of 5s into four sections based on the locations of the numbers 1, 6, 7, and 3.
Q4: Replace the 5s in each section with the corresponding number (1, 6, 7, or 3) from Q1.
Q5: Keep the rest of the grid as it is.

Q2: Determine the range of the 5s in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the locations of the number 3 in the input grid.
Q4: Replace the 5s in the range determined in Q2 with the number 1, 6, or 7 based on the locations identified in Q1.
Q5: Replace the 5s in the range determined in Q2 with the number 3 based on the locations identified in Q3.
